EditTextPreference.android:title: Socket timeout
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Connection times out in %value% milliseconds. Note that this is the response timeout and should be put high enough.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Vibrate on Touch
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Makes the remote control vibrate on touch.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Timeout before reconnect
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Wait for %value% seconds before trying to reconnect

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Statusbar notifications
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show now playing notifications in the status bar.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show incoming SMS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Shows incoming SMS with contact name and picture on your TV.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show incoming calls
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Pauses playback and shows incoming calls with contact name and picture on your TV.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable keyguard in RC
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disables the screen lock when the application is in remote control mode. (Display will still dim/turn off.)
